name: jira-manager
description: Manage Jira projects and issues via the Jira REST API. List projects, create/get/update issues, transition statuses, search with JQL, add comments, and assign issues. Uses injected provider client for API access (BYOK).
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: jira_manager
toolDefinition.description: Manage Jira projects and issues: list projects, get/create/update issues, transition issue statuses, search with JQL, add comments, list transitions, and assign issues. Layer 1 skill using injected provider client for Jira API access.

action.description: list_projects (all projects), get_issue (issue details), create_issue (new issue), update_issue (modify fields), transition_issue (change status), search_issues (JQL search), add_comment (comment on issue), list_transitions (available transitions), assign_issue (assign to user)

issueKey.description: Jira issue key (e.g. 'PROJ-123'). Required for get_issue, update_issue, transition_issue, add_comment, list_transitions, assign_issue.

projectKey.description: Jira project key (e.g. 'PROJ'). Required for create_issue.

issueType.description: Issue type name (default: 'Task'). Used by create_issue.

assignee.description: Assignee account ID. Used by create_issue.

labels.description: Labels to apply. Used by create_issue.

fields.description: Object of fields to update. Required for update_issue.

transitionId.description: Transition ID to execute. Required for transition_issue.

jql.description: JQL query string. Required for search_issues.

body.description: Comment body text. Required for add_comment.

accountId.description: Atlassian account ID. Required for assign_issue.
